mapper.insert: insert into article (id, title, thumbnail, category_id, status, tenant_id, featured, view_count, published_time, created_time, updated_time, created_by_user_id, updated_by_user_id, content) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{thumbnail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{tenantId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{featured,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{viewCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{publishedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdByUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updatedByUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update article set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, thumbnail = #{thumbnail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, category_id = #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, tenant_id = #{tenantId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, featured = #{featured,jdbcType=TINYINT}, view_count = #{viewCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, published_time = #{publishedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_time = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, created_by_user_id = #{createdByUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, updated_by_user_id = #{updatedByUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, title, thumbnail, category_id, status, tenant_id, featured, view_count, published_time, created_time, updated_time, created_by_user_id, updated_by_user_id, content from article where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
